name: Gemini 2.5 Flash Live Preview
description: Latest real-time streaming model with 1M token context for low-latency multimodal interactions via Live API. Enhanced audio quality with 30 HD voices in 24 languages. Supports proactive audio and affective dialog.
notes: PREVIEW - Latest Live API model with native audio. Enhanced conversational capabilities with emotional understanding. Voice Activity Detection, multilingual support, tool use. Audio input $3.00/1M, audio output $12.00/1M tokens. 25 tokens/sec audio, 258 tokens/sec video.
